languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс тихо смеется.{/n} "По крайней мере, да. Что ж... прошу". {n}Он протягивает вам руку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс тихо смеется.{/n} "По крайней мере, да. Что ж... прошу". {n}Он протягивает вам руку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希低声笑了起来。{/n}“到头来，是啊。所以说……如果你愿意和我一起的话……”{n}他向你伸出了手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希低声笑了起来。{/n}“到头来，是啊。所以说……如果你愿意和我一起的话……”{n}他向你伸出了手。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ríe calladamente.{/n} «Por lo menos, sí. Así que... si me acompaña...». {n}Te alarga la mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ríe calladamente.{/n} «Por lo menos, sí. Así que... si me acompaña...». {n}Te alarga la mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは静かに笑う。{/n}「少なくとも、そうだな。だから…もしよかったら一緒に…」{n}彼はあなたに手を差し出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは静かに笑う。{/n}「少なくとも、そうだな。だから…もしよかったら一緒に…」{n}彼はあなたに手を差し出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix rit discrètement.{/n} « C'est déjà ça. Donc... si vous voulez bien vous joindre à moi... » {n}Il vous tend une main.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix rit discrètement.{/n} « C'est déjà ça. Donc... si vous voulez bien vous joindre à moi... » {n}Il vous tend une main.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht leise.{/n} "Zumindest, ja. Also ... Wenn Ihr Euch mir anschließt ..." {n}Er lädt dich mit einer Geste seiner Hand ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Evet, en azından. Yani... Bana eşlik edersen..." {n}Heinrix sana elini uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs quietly.{/n} "At the very least, yes. So... If you'll join me..." {n}He holds out his hand to you.{/n}
